name: Izil's Quest
description:
UPDATE April 7 2021: Lowered upgrade prices, increased max HP limit, added small text scene, and fixed camera in final cutscene.

Please let me know if there are any problems.

Game can be beaten in 10-15 minutes.

Game has no sound.  No save system implemented.

Controller seems to work if plugged in before starting the game, but sometimes doesn't work.  Not sure why.

Cheats made mainly for Kyle since there's no save system and you can't get all the upgrades without replaying bosses.

Cheats:

Highlight Upgrade and press F5 3 times quickly to get 1000 marbles (repeatable).

Highlight About and press F5 3 times quickly to unlock all levels and most upgrades.

Schippie Dues:

On floor 7 there is a hidden exit.  Above the spike floor there's a gap in the ceiling.  Jump up there to find the hidden exit.

Controls: (Keyboard/PS/XBOX)

[WASD/Arrows][Dpad]- Movement

[. or Enter][cross][A] - Accept

[P][Start] - Pause

[,][square][X] - Attack

[.][cross][A] - Jump

[/][L1][LB] - Dash (needs to be unlocked)
